author: Harrison Wicks
text:
I’m currently doing research on how cities use their intranets for the purpose of employee engagement and involvement. Essentially what I’m trying to find is anything that has been done that engages employees in a way similar to Facebook, MindMixer, etc. with forums or interactive updates where employees can comment. 
I look forward to your response.
title: Intranet format to encourage employee engagement
